About me

Greetings, and thanks for visiting my Website! My name is Jesse Lunger. I grew up and lived in the Eugene Portland Oregon area my entire life working in health care, food service, education and home improvment. I recently got a education in computer science and am working to break my way into professional software development. I'm want to connect with motivated individuals or companies looking to hire a software developer for long term employment or temporary work.
